description: Detects modification of the registry settings used for Internet Explorer and other Windows components that use these settings. An attacker can abuse this registry key to add a domain to the trusted sites Zone or insert javascript for persistence
author: frack113
name: Modification of IE Registry Settings
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ss][Ee][Tt][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ss].*/ AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD*) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(/[Cc][Oo][Oo][Kk][Ii][Ee]\:/ OR /[Vv][Ii][Ss][Ii][Tt][Ee][Dd]\:/ OR /\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/)) OR (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee][Mm][Aa][Pp].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Pp][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ee][Cc][Ii][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:/[Bb][Ii][Nn][Aa][Rr][Yy]\ [Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]/) OR (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Pp][Tt][Ee][Dd]\ [Dd][Oo][Cc][Uu][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\\.*/))))
